analysis.description:
VeloxToken._getStakingReward (/unique_chucks/9/0xdcd77408e9b16252025637020228f3965938dda5.sol#221-229) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- coinAge <= 0 (/unique_chucks/9/0xdcd77408e9b16252025637020228f3965938dda5.sol#227)

VeloxToken._getCoinAge (/unique_chucks/9/0xdcd77408e9b16252025637020228f3965938dda5.sol#233-244) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _now < uint256(transferIns[_address][i].time).add(STAKE_MIN_AGE) (/unique_chucks/9/0xdcd77408e9b16252025637020228f3965938dda5.sol#235-240)
